description:
Fenny has thought of a super-funny story. He decides to tell everyone and hurries to Bonobono`s place. But only Bonobono`s father is home. He says he`ll listen to the story instead, but starts laughing partway through and Fenny can`t finish. Fenny goes into the forest to find someone to listen to his story.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ものすごくおもしろい話
